turns.speaker: client
turns.text: AI can you call Little Caesars on East Dakota in Fresno, CA?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can do that; I have connected with the store.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: AI I would like a Pretzel Crust pizza. How much is it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A Pretzel Crust pizza is $6.00; should I order it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please order one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have one Pretzel Crust pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: AI could you see if they have Caesar Wings?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can check please standby; they have them and they are $6.50.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good I will take a order of Caesar wings also.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have one Pretzel pizza and one order of Caesar wings is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: AI please order one 2-liter bottle of Pepsi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have one 2-liter bottle of Pepsi, one Pretzel pizza and one order of Caesar wings; Is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: AI can I get a subtotal on that order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, your subtotal is $15.00

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: AI can you add one bottle of water and give a new subtotal?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One bottle of water has been added and the new subtotal is $16.75

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: AI could you checkout and give me the total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I have one Pretzel pizza, one order of Caesar wings, one 2-liter Pepsi and one bottle of water with a total of $17.55.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good you may place the order and standby for delivery instructions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Order has been placed and I am ready to receive delivery instructions.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: AI have pizza delivered to 100 Main St. Fresno, Ca 99999

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have the delivery address is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, add a note to ask for Sam when the delivery is made.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have noted to ask for Sam when deliver is made to 100 Main St. Fresno, Ca. 99999

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good; that is all you make disconnect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Order has been placed and disconnecting and finalizing communications. I am out.
